Title: Episode #2.1
Writer: David E. Kelley (created by), David E. Kelley, Liane Moriarty (based on a story by), Matthew Tinker (story editor)
Actors: Reese Witherspoon, Nicole Kidman, Shailene Woodley, Iain Armitage
Plot: The return of "Big Little Lies" will explore the "malignancy of lies, the durability of friendships, the fragility of marriage and, of course, the vicious ferocity of sound parenting. ...
